doc:
Shane Lyons https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shane_Lyons 0 Shane Edward Lyons (born February 18, 1988) is an American chef, restaurateur and actor. He and partner Nick Lovvachini opened their New York restaurant in June 2013. Lyons was also a contestant on the 4th season of the Food Network's The Next Food Network Star. Shane_Edward_Lyons ( born February_18_,_1988 ) is an_American_chef , restaurateur_and_actor . He and partner_Nick_Lovvachini opened their_New_York_restaurant in June_2013 . Lyons was also a_contestant on the_4th_season of the_Food_Network 's_The_Next_Food_Network_Star .
